content_descriptors.notes: Horny Holiday Demo does not contain any graphic nudity or sexual content.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 or Kernel 3.x+ distributions
  • Processor: 2.0ghz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GT 750 or better, AMD equivalent
  • Additional Notes: OpenGL 2, DirectX 9 or OpenGL ES 2 required
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.6 or higher
  • Processor: Dual Core or better
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GT 750 or better, AMD equivalent
  • Additional Notes: OpenGL 2, DirectX 9 or OpenGL ES 2 required
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Processor: Intel Only
